{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Nahida
|date               = 2023-10-27
|zh                 = 
;今天是纳西妲的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''纳西妲：'''水中畅游…听起来，你们在水之国发生了不少有趣的事情。
:'''派蒙：'''是的是的，虽然说经常被洋流卷走，不过习惯了也没有那么害怕啦~
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙变勇敢了呢。
:'''派蒙：'''嘿嘿，主要是旅行者在身边，我才能鼓起勇气下水，我可不想再被钓起来一次。
:'''兰帕卡提：'''给金色的那菈，好吃的果子！
:'''纳西妲：'''谢谢你们准备的下午茶，快来这里坐下，还有很多故事要分享呢。
:'''纳西妲：'''这一颗果子最甜，就奖励给勇敢的派蒙吧~
|dialogue_review_zh = 「快来这里坐下，还有很多故事要分享呢。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Nahida]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Nahida:''' Swimming freely in the water, huh... Sounds like the two of you have had quite a few interesting adventures in the [[Fontaine|nation of Hydro]].
:'''Paimon:''' That's right! We get swept away by [[Current]]s pretty often, but it's not so scary once you're used to it~
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon's become braver, too.
:'''Paimon:''' Hehe, it's all thanks to staying by the Traveler's side that Paimon can pluck up the courage to dive into the water! Paimon doesn't wanna get fished up again at all.
:'''[[Arapacati]]:''' Here you go, Golden Nara! Yummy fruit!
:'''Nahida:''' Thank you all for preparing this afternoon tea. Come and have a seat, there are still so many stories to tell.
:'''Nahida:''' This is the sweetest fruit. You can have it as a reward for your courage, Paimon~
|dialogue_review_en = "Come and have a seat, there are still so many stories to tell."
}}
